Data.FoundationSchool: East of England Foundation School
Data.EmployerTrust: BEDFORDSHIRE HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST
Data.Specialties: Emergency Medicine, General (Internal) Medicine, General Surgery, Obstetrics and Gynaecology, Paediatrics
Data.ProgrammeTitle: 25/FPP/EAN/RC971/GEN/F1/01
Data.ProgrammeDescription: F1 - General (Internal) Medicine (Respiratory), General Surgery (Upper GI), Obstetrics and Gynaecology.  F2 - Emergency Medicine (60%) / Primary Care (40%), Paediatrics (60%) / Primary Care (40%).  This programme is part of the national enhance trailblazer offer to support the development of the future doctor.  It includes additional educational programme elements and a longitudinal integrated clerkship in F2 between primary and secondary care, with additional opportunities aligned with the future doctor strategy. This means you will have two 6 month placements in F2 where you will spend approximately 2/3 of time in the acute care element and 1/3 in the enhance element.  Please see our webpage https://bit.ly/eoeenhance for more details as this exciting and innovative programme evolves.  Please note these rotations may be subject to change.

Data.ProgrammeTitle: 25/FPP/EAN/RQ800/GEN/F1/05
Data.ProgrammeDescription: F1 - General Surgery, General (Internal) Medicine (Gastroenterology), Trauma and Orthopaedic Surgery.  F2 - Respiratory Medicine 60% / General Practice 40%, Emergency Medicine 60% / General Practice 40%.  This programme is part of the national enhance trailblazer offer to support the development of the future doctor.  It includes additional educational programme elements and a longitudinal integrated clerkship in F2 between primary, community and secondary care, with additional opportunities aligned with the future doctor strategy. This means you will have two 6 month placements in F2 where you will spend approximately 2/3 of time in the acute care element and 1/3 in the enhance element.  Please see our webpage https://bit.ly/eoeenhance for more details as this exciting and innovative programme evolves.  Please note these rotations may be subject to change.

It includes additional educational programme elements and a longitudinal integrated clerkship in F2 between primary and secondary care, with additional opportunities aligned with the future doctor strategy.  This means you will have two 6 month placements in F2 where you will split your time betwwen acute care and the enhance community element.  Please see our webpage https://bit.ly/eoeenhance for more details as this exciting and innovative programme evolves.  Please note these rotations may be subject to change.
